input: TractionBuild is an AI-powered platform that transforms business ideas into production-ready products through automated workflow orchestration. It uses intelligent agent collaboration and comprehensive project management to validate ideas, build MVPs, and launch products efficiently.
output: TractionBuild automates the journey from business idea to product launch using AI agents and workflow orchestration.

input: The platform includes GDPR compliance management, real-time data encryption, and audit trails for enterprise use. It processes customer avatars like startup entrepreneurs, SMEs, investors, and corporate innovation labs to validate business hypotheses.
output: TractionBuild provides enterprise-grade compliance and validates business ideas using customer avatar analysis.
